DATATYPES SQL SUMMARY TRIGGERS
Table : TBL_RS_SUBRECORDS

This Tables links a parent Record (the RecordId field points to the parent record in the Tbl_R_Record table) to a Child-Record (the ChildRecord points to a Record in the Table

Field Summary
Name Type Description
RECORDID TBL_R_RECORDS(RECORDID)

Primary Key of the Record Table and part of the key for the SubRecord Table (with SubKey)

This key is used internally in the System and not displayed to the user.
CHILDRECORD TBL_R_RECORDS(RECORDID)

Record Id -

to a ChildRecord

This field links a parent Record (pointed to by RecordId) to a ChildRecord
FIELDSTART INTEGER

Not Used Yet
FIELD VarChar30

Field Name of the field that is used to determine if this is the correct Layout to Use

ie If this field held RecordType and the field FieldValue hold H Then this ChildRecord will be used for all records where RecordType=1
FIELDVALUE VarChar30  
Parent_RecordId TBL_R_RECORDS(RECORDID)

For Future use. It is to allow for Parent/Child relationships in a File.

ie A File might consist

  • PO Record

    1. Product Record

    2. Product Record

    3. Product Record

  • PO Record

    1. Product Record

    2. Product Record

  • PO Record

    1. Product Record

    2. Product Record

Then the Product record is a child record of the PO Record

Sql Summary
Name Type PrKey Unq NotN MUnq Def Idx1 Udx1

CHILDRECORD INTEGER

FIELDVALUE varchar(30)
